title: Instagram expands product tagging feature to everyone in the US
content:
Instagram is expanding product tagging to all users in the US. Up until now, only select brands and celebrities could tag products in a post. But now, anyone with a public account can tag their favorite products in their feed posts. Instagram says the product tagging feature will allow users to support their favorite small
